main event: A witness reported observing a bright light moving rapidly in the sky near Bourbon, Missouri on January 6, 1968.
interesting points: The witness observed the light for approximately 2 to 3 minutes,The light made a sharp turn to the west before disappearing,The object appeared to be considerably larger than a star and glowed bright white,There were no visible trails or exhaust coming from the light,The report concluded the light was not an aircraft or any known aerial vehicle.
sighted object: a bright light in the sky
